Song.title: Endless Ages
Song.copyright: Words and Music by T. Lively Fluharty

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [D]Wor[G/B]thy [D]Lord,[G/B] so [D]wor[G/B]thy [D]Lord [G/B] So [D]worthy [G/B]of our [D]never [G/B]ending [D]praise [ G/B D G/B ]
Verse 2: [D]You [G/B]were [D]slain,[G/B] You [D]put [G/B]a - [D]way [G/B] [D]All our [G/B]sin by [D]offering [G/B]up Your[D]self [ G/B D G/B ]
Verse 3: [D]By [G/B]Your [D]blood [G/B], Your [D]ho[G/B]ly [D]blood [G/B] You [D]bought us [G/B]and You [D]brought us [G/B]near to [D]God [ G/B D ]
Pre-Chorus: [G]Oh how You love us, oh how You freed us [D]Oh how You sav[G/B]ed us, and oh how You keep us [G]And you will bring us Into Your presence and [A]crown us with loving kindness
[G]And when we see You, we will be like You We’ll [D]fall down be[G/B]fore You in awe and adore You We [G]will enjoy You, forever enjoy You Through the [A]end-less…endless ages to [D]come [ G/B D G/B D G/B D G/B to verse 1]
2X to Chorus: [ D Em7 G A ]
{new_page} Chorus: O [D]Lord O’ [Em7]how can [G]these things [A]be? That [D]sinners [Em7]have e[G]terni[A]ty To [D]marvel [Em7]at your [G]mercy [A]and your [D]grace [ Em7 G A ] Lord [D]you with[Em7]held what [G]we de[A]served And you [D]gave us [Em7]what we [G]don’t de[A]serve Oh [D]there’ll be [Em7]endless [G]ages [A]for this [D]grace [ Em7 G A - 3x]
Tag: You’re so [D]good,[Em7] so [G]good to [A]me You’re so [D]good,[Em7] so [G]good to [A]me. And for [D]endless [Em7]ages [G]you’ll be [A]good to [D]me [ Em7 G A ]
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 worthy lord so worthy lord so worthy of our never ending praise verse 2 you were slain you put a way all our sin by offering up yourself verse 3 by your blood your holy blood you bought us and you brought us near to god prechorus oh how you love us oh how you freed us oh how you saved us and oh how you keep us and you will bring us into your presence and crown us with loving kindness and when we see you we will be like you well fall down before you in awe and adore you we will enjoy you forever enjoy you through the endlessendless ages to come 2x to chorus chorus o lord o how can these things be that sinners have eternity to marvel at your mercy and your grace lord you withheld what we deserved and you gave us what we dont deserve oh therell be endless ages for this grace tag youre so good so good to me youre so good so good to me and for endless ages youll be good to me
